title: Chinese pork fried rice
ingredients: ['150g pork fillet, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 or 2 tablespoons Chinese rice wine or sherry', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '2 tablespoons peanut oil', '1/2 onion, diced', '2 teaspoons curry powder mixed with a little water to make a paste', '1 or 2 spring onions, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '300g leftover cooked rice, cold', '100g garden peas']
